name: Main HTML

sql:
select distinct
  last.mmsi as mmsi, last.lasttime as time, lastspeed as speed,
  lastlat as lat, lastlong as long,
  lastcourse as course, ships.name as name, ships.type as shiptype, ships.dest as destination
from last, ships
where (ships.mmsi is last.mmsi)
and (last.lasttime > strftime('%s','now')-3600*48)
order by last.lasttime DESC LIMIT 20;
name: Recent ships
Define SQL query
func:
msg.topic = `select distinct
  last.mmsi as mmsi,
  last.lasttime as time,
  lastspeed as speed,
  lastlat as lat,
  lastlong as lon,
  lastcourse as heading,
  ships.name as name,
  ships.type as shiptype,
  ships.dest as destination
  from last, ships
  where (ships.mmsi is last.mmsi)
  and (ships.mmsi is "${msg.payload.mmsi}");`;


return msg;
